description.value:
Unlock: When you reach 6th level overall you may take the ability below

One of the Ninja’s greatest abilities is to create copies of themselves and employ them in combat or use them to aid in deceit.  As an Action a Ninja may create a Copy of themselves in a space adjacent to them.  It costs 1 Spirit per Copy made, and a ninja can make 1 Copy at 6th level and 2 Copies at 12th level.  

Copies move when you do in the initiative order and their actions are controlled by you.  On the first turn summoned, a Copy may only move or take an action.  After the turn they were summoned, a Copy may make an action and a move action.  

 

A Copy has the following statistics: 

  • Base stats, skills, and proficiencies are identical to yours
  • A Copy has no class features aside from Sneak Attack and any Ninja abilities you possess at time of creation, aside from Multiplicity.
    • A Copy’s Sneak Attack deals 2d6 damage.  When you hit 12th level, it goes up to 3d6.  
  • Hit Points equal to your overall character level + your proficiency bonus
  • They must spend Spirit to use Ninja abilities as the base class states
  • Spirit equal to half your proficiency bonus
  • They are wearing the same armor as you, and carry a copy of a single weapon on your person, but gain none of your other equipment.  Any magical effects from your weapon or armor does not work for your Copy
  • A Copy gains the following abilities as well: 
    • Shared Mind: A Copy knows everything that its creator knows, including languages.  As well, everything that a Copy senses is known to its creator, provided they are on the same plane, and even over great distances.  
    • Telepathic Bond: While a Copy is on the same plane as its creator, it can share what it senses with them and communicate telepathically.  
  • A Copy lasts for 1 minute after summoned before vanishing
  • Should their Hit Points drop to 0, or their Spirit drop to 0, a Copy and all equipment they were created with, vanishes

system.requirements: 6th level overall, must have the Rogue Starter Abilities
